Description:
Coastal Moonah Magic
The Feel:
Incredible family memories begin at 25 Saratoga! Get ready to move straight in & enjoy the best of coastal living this summer, with everything you could imagine for a lifetime of leisure & entertaining. Freshly painted & boasting brand new Smeg appliances, this solid construction offers 4 bedrooms & 2 zoned living areas, with room to work from home. The ultimate backyard haven is composed of a huge covered courtyard, pool house, superb solar heated in-ground pool, BBQ & day bed - promoting versatile indoor/outdoor living under your very own Moonah forest.
The Facts:
-4 BR home on 669sqm approx. in highly sought-after pocket of Barwon Heads
-North frontage coastal woodland setting in desirable street with no-thru traffic
-Very private haven, fully fenced with ample OSP & extra parking for the toys
-Magnificent solar-heated, in-ground pool, surrounded by Spotted Gum decking
-Pool house (6x4m): entire north side bifold doors open onto deck
-6x4m solar-heated, in-ground pool (3 spa jets), features Spotted Gum decking & day bed
-Covered alfresco (5x4m) & Pool House (6x4m): entire north side bifold doors to pool deck
-Huge covered courtyard for the ultimate in year-round entertaining
-Family lounge & Master have brand new extra heavy duty/stain resistant twist pile carpet
-Timber laminate floors to entry & main living area
-Kitchen with servery-style brekky bar, feature cabinetry & step-in pantry
-All new appliances: Smeg electric oven & induction cooktop, F&P double-drawer DW
-Dining room welcomes the morning sun, adjacent to informal living area
-Master with private north outlook to Moonah trees + lockable WIR & en suite
-3 more carpeted BRs, 2 with stunning outlooks over the pool & iconic Moonah Trees
-Bathroom of its era with shower, bath & vanity & separate WC
-Professionally painted inside & out, with timber plantation shutters, present cool coastal vibes
-Zoned ducted heating/cooling provides year-round comfort, wifi controlled by mobile app
-Study nook allows you to work from home - NBN (with 2 lines)
-Ring doorbell allows you to monitor your entryway
-Steel framed house, clad in Western Red Cedar plus 3 garden sheds
-Walk to the Village Park, beach, Barwon Heads Primary & Hitchcock Avenue
The Owner Loves.
We spend most of our time outside under the Moonah Trees & relaxing in the pool, with countless memories of entertaining friends & BBQs. Its a beautiful sunny position & a great neighbourhood - we are excited for the next family to live here & create new memories.
*All information offered by Bellarine Property is provided in good faith. It is derived from sources believed to be accurate and current as at the date of publication and as such Bellarine Property simply pass this information on. Use of such material is at your sole risk. Prospective purchasers are advised to make their own enquiries with respect to the information that is passed on. Bellarine Property will not be liable for any loss resulting from any action or decision by you in reliance on the information.

Description:
ABSOLUTELY STUNNING ON ALL LEVELS!!!
This stunning architecturally significant property is undoubtedly one of the finest homes on the Surf Coast providing you a premium lifestyle opportunity.
Set in a quiet cul-de-sac on The Esplanade in the desirable Sands Estate surrounded by magnificent homes directly opposite the beautiful Whites Beach and backing onto The Sands championship Golf Course and Clubhouse. The collaboration between renowned local builder John Walker and designer Wolveridge Architects Melbourne delivers a spectacular property, breathtaking in beauty, remarkable in scale with an uncompromised level of finish.
Perfect for the family who love to entertain and with an emphasis on indoor and outdoor living, the property oozes style and sophistication. Consisting 3-bedroom suites located on the upper level, which include en-suites and built in robes, dressing room to the master bedroom and luxurious en-suite highlighted by concrete vanity with twin basin, heated floor, travertine tiles and large bathtub. The dedicated study / home office with built in cabinetry is situated on the lower level adjacent to the dynamic kitchen with custom concrete and ultra-high-end resin bench tops, Miele appliances 900mm oven and cook-top, microwave and warmer zip water tap and an abundance of storage. Polished concrete floors, large sliding doors and windows and cedar exterior battens maximise the easy care but uber-cool beach estate lifestyle.
The choice of 2 living spaces, one an exclusive intimate lounge/media room with open fireplace, the other an expansive beautiful dining and superb living room with 5m ceilings and open fireplace and opening out onto the north facing entertaining area, overlooking the magnificent 13m in-ground pool with picturesque views over the lush 10th fairway.
Some of the home's many extra features include: towering entry void with beautiful 'floating' spotted gum timber staircase housing an impressive glassed wine cellar underneath, 3.5m ceilings, electric blinds, powder room, extensive storage cabinetry including internal store room, hydronic heating, commercial grade cooling, split system heating and cooling to bedrooms, skylights, Sonos music system throughout, double glazed windows, double lock up garage including laundry with built in cabinetry and external timber slatted façade that can tilt, open and lock into place allowing that extra sunlight to stream through.
This exclusively master-built residence was short listed in the 2013 Victorian Architecture Awards and has been featured in numerous architecture magazines internationally, situated on a 984m2 (approx.) allotment. Built to exacting commercial standards with concrete tilt slab, square set and shadow line plastering throughout and full height doors and quality materials highlight the premium nature of this property.
Described by the owners as the nicest house to live in of the 20 or so we have had over the years, this home is ideally suited to those with a sense of style, who enjoy entertaining and families who appreciate space. This truly is resort style living at its best. Make a time to book your private inspection as you won't be disappointed!!!
Insights: 261 The Esplanade, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 126 other 3 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
Contemporary Cottage Living at its Best
Located in peaceful pocket of Grovedale, this charming weatherboard cottage sits proudly on a large 792m2 allotment. Inside, the north facing living area welcomes you with a light and airy ambience that is awash with natural light. The kitchen will simply delight with rich timber benchtops, electric oven, gas cooktop, rangehood, fully integrated Bosch dishwasher and large corner pantry.
Three bedrooms (two with built-in robes) share close access to the fresh main bathroom, which boasts a dual vanity with timber benchtop. The laundry features a separate toilet, linen cupboard and external access. Youll be comfortable all year long thanks to ducted heating, a split system in the lounge and modern ceiling fans in all bedrooms.
The sheltered alfresco deck inspires relaxed outdoor living, while the lush grassy backyard is home to a variety of fruit trees and a large fire pit. Cottage gardens line the driveway to the oversized single lock-up garage that includes remote access.
The exception location is ideal for commuters being only a short walk to the Waurn Ponds Train Station (0.8km) and is within minutes of the Ring Road, Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Deakin University and the Epworth Hospital. With Grovedale West Primary School and Grovedale College also within walking distance, this location is superb for young growing families.
Occupying approx. 792m2, this cottage-style home presents an ideal choice for first homebuyers, families and investors alike. Dual vehicle access to the backyard is provided via both Chiller Court and Mulholland Crescent, making this ideal for storage. The expansive land size also offers potential for development (STCA).
With so much to offer, youll need to act quickly to snap up this terrific opportunity.
Insights: 10 Chiller Court, Grovedale VIC 3216 was last sold in 2016 and 143 other 3 bedroom house in Grovedale have recently been sold.

Description:
Beautiful family home in quiet pocket of Leopold.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Deane Hughes on 0407 926 659 or Kingston Wade on 0438 033 999.
Set on a generous 563m2 in the ever-popular estuary estate, this beautiful family home is sure to appeal to those that are searching for space, peace, and privacy. Comprising 4 very generous bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 separate living areas, and a sunny backyard, this could be the perfect first home or even investment property.
On entry is a large living room, which flows through to the light-filled kitchen, living, and family room. The kitchen features stainless steel appliances, stone benches, and quality cabinetry throughout.
The main living area opens out to a secure backyard, which offers low-maintenance gardens and direct gated access to the front via the side pedestrian gate; perfect for those with kids and pets.
Accommodation is made up of a large main bedroom with walk-in robe and ensuite at the front of the home, and 3 bedrooms to the rear of the home; 2 with built-in robes.
Noteworthy features include:
- Split system air-conditioning in both living areas
- Gas Ducted Heating
- 4 Camera Security System
- Double Garage with remote
- 5 years old built by Hamlan Homes
Located within walking distance local parks, BBQ areas and playgrounds and Estuary Reserve, just 3 minutes' drive to the Gateway Plaza, as well as being about 20 minutes' drive from Geelong and the Surf Coast, there is a lot to like about this neat package!
Insights: First listed on 23 September, this house has been on Domain for 26 days (last updated on 6 September). It was last sold in 2015 and 94 other 4 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
Spacious family home in a serene pocket.
Situated on 910m2, in a blue-chip Leopold location, this spacious family home offers so much to the growing family. Comprising 4 large bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, formal and informal living, and a stunning and private backyard, this property is sure to suit a vast array of savvy buyers.
On entry, a large formal living and dining room is a great space that can be utilised as intended or even be converted into a home office or rumpus room.
The kitchen features quality blackwood cabinetry, 900mm gas cooktop with glass splashbacks, dual drawer dishwasher, a 'one and a half' oven and plentiful storage throughout. The kitchen overlooks the open plan living area which opens seamlessly to a large undercover entertainment deck with feature lighting and tranquil surrounds.
Accommodation is well-appointed and features a large main bedroom with a large walk-in robe with built-in cabinetry, updated ensuite, ceiling fan, and an a/c unit for year-round comfort. 3 more bedrooms are situated to the rear of the home and all offer large built-in robes. Bedroom 4 is currently being utilised as a home office and has been fitted with downlights for better lighting. The large central bathroom features a modern floating vanity, large shower, bath, and a separate toilet.
Outside, the stunning backyard is flooding with year-round greenery, is private and secure for those with young children and pets and offers plenty of space for a pool (STCA).
The oversized double garage features high ceilings and doors, sturdy overhead storage shelves, enough space for a workshop and 2 cars, as well as the possibility to extend the roller doors to accommodate a large boat or caravan if need be. Adjacent the garage is a double carport with power and lighting, and undercover access to the home.
Notable features include:
- Split system air conditioning in the main living.
- Central heating throughout.
- L.E.D lighting throughout.
- Large laundry.
- Ceiling fans in all bedrooms and living areas.
- Roller shutters in 3 bedrooms.
- Ducted Vacuum.
- Irrigation system from laundry to garden.
- Under house storage.
This exceptional property is located within 5 minutes of Leopold's Gateway Plaza, just 15 minutes to the Geelong Waterfront, 10 minutes to the Bellarine Peninsula, and with easy access to some of Geelong's finest schools, this feature-packed property showcases the superior blend of convenience, practicality, and quality, in one of Geelong's most popular suburbs. Enquire today!
To book your private inspection please contact Deane Hughes on 0407 926 659 or Kingston Wade on 0438 033 999.
Insights: 4 Abigail Court, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 1994 and 94 other 4 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
THIS IS THE LIFE
Sleek lines provide a sophisticated profile for this exceptional townhouse with a location of utmost convenience, your new home has immediate accessibility to everything picturesque Torquay has to offer.
Superb style and a north facing expansive entertaining deck define the upstairs living / dining area featuring wormy chestnut hardwood flooring, hydronic heating, split system heating and cooling, plenty of natural light and distant ocean glimpses. A hidden study and beautiful kitchen boasting Caesar stone benches, 900mm cooktop / oven and walk in pantry.
Downstairs along with the welcoming entrance provides the accommodation including a master bedroom with walk in robe and en suite featuring a superb potted bamboo tree , further bedroom with built in robe and second bathroom, European laundry and a second living / reading room with a peaceful outlook to a seclusive courtyard.
Packed with features including floor to ceiling tiles to bathrooms, elevated square set ceilings, V groove feature walls in the main living, Mondo decking and natural gas BBQ point to entertaining deck, under stair storage, low maintenance gardens and private laneway access to secure parking.
With absolutely nothing more to do than just move in and enjoy the coastal lifestyle, with an easy walk to the beach, medical facilities, restaurants, cafes', supermarkets, bowls club and much more. This is a fantastic opportunity to purchase a quality property in a fantastic location!!
Insights: 26A Boston Road, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2016 and 10 other 2 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
SUPERB DESIGN GENEROUS DIMENSIONS
High on style with lifestyle convenience is this wonderful brand-new home built by Hudson Ridge Builders, the Nevada 35 is a spacious 4 bedroom single-level dwelling with quality features throughout. Filled with light the generously proportioned interior reveals a sun splashed open plan lounge, dining, and contemporary kitchen with Caesar Stone benchtops, integrated ILVE appliances, 900mm cook top, walk in pantry and soft close doors and drawers. Well zoned accommodation places the master bedroom at the front with walk in robe and en-suite boasting floor to ceiling tiles to the shower and twin basin, while the remaining bedrooms with built in robes share a family bathroom situated to the rear of the home along-side a second living / rumpus room and study with built in cabinetry.
The home has been finished with Hebel render and double-glazed windows to assist with sound and thermal performance, square set cornice, 2.5metre ceilings and 2.34metre high doors feature internally. Enhanced with a north faced entertaining area, Mezzo gas log fire, ducted heating and evaporite cooling, built in cabinetry throughout, drying cabinet and triple car garage with internal access on a fully professionally landscaped huge allotment of 682m2 (approx.).
Why build when you can purchase this exceptional quality home today, conveniently set within minutes to Surf Coast Secondary College, Torquay Coast Primary school, playground, childcare centre, Dunes shopping village, local sporting reserves, Whites beach, Sands Golf Course and easy access to the Surf Coast Highway.
Do not delay, call today to book your private inspection!!

Description:
Views And Sunny Parkside Living
Private Inspections Welcome - By Appointment Only
Nestled into lush gardens and perfectly positioned to enjoy all day sun, this spacious light filled town home is sure to impress.
Upstairs is for living and enjoying the expansive outlook over the treetops of Deep Creek Reserve to the sea beyond. The open plan living zone is flooded with natural light and it enjoys easy connection to outdoor entertaining. Generously proportioned yet with an intimate cosiness, it features a gas log fire; custom built study nook; two separate deck areas; and beautiful Tasmanian Oak flooring. The kitchen is well appointed with Caesarstone bench tops, quality appliances and a pantry plus extra storage too. Open up the bi-fold windows to create a servery that makes entertaining on the sunny deck completely effortless.
Downstairs features a master bedroom with a cleverly organised walk-in robe; a large en-suite with spa bath; and sliding door access to a sheltered garden patio. Two additional bedrooms boast ample storage. The larger of the two, with a sitting area, external entry and private terrace, offers an ideal space for overflow accommodation for family or paying guests.
The decor throughout is contemporary and soothing, and additional features such as hydronic heating, double-glazing and ducted vacuuming add to liveability. While outdoors the verdant cottage gardens, filled with herbs and pops of colour, create a tranquil and welcoming feel.
Tennis courts, playgrounds and a walking track to the beach are easily accessed in the reserve directly opposite, and schools, shops and cafes are nearby too. For anyone looking for a serene retreat that is close to nature and the ocean yet so close to Torquay, this is the one.
Note: Photo id with current address must be provided at all open for inspections due to Covid 19 restrictions.
https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=oS2AkSD4Phm

Description:
Low maintenance living in Belmont hotspot.
Sale by SET DATE 9/10/2020 (unless sold prior)
This low maintenance delight offering flawless positioning will tick many boxes for any first/last home buyer or investor looking to add a solid investment to their portfolio.
Comprising of three well sized bedrooms, two with built-in robes, serviced by a neat central bathroom with a separate toilet, a master offering a walk-in robe and ensuite. The main area of the home combines a light-filled kitchen with quality cooking appliances, living and dining area complimented by ducted heating and split system air conditioning. A private undercover courtyard is the focal point of any entertainer.
Location is unparalleled! All major amenities, including - but definitely not limited to - cafes, health clinics, shops, restaurants, public transport and renowned schools for all ages are at your metaphorical doorstep and an easy 10 minute drive takes you to the Geelong waterfront.
Kick back and relax or rent out and reap the rewards.

Description:
916m2 Allotment, Residential Growth Zone Schedule 2
Attention all developers and investors, a myriad of opportunity awaits the astute purchaser of this property walking distance to Leopold Primary and Gateway Plaza! Subject to council approval, the owner has four concept plans prepared which show potential to either:
1. Keep the house and build 1 or 2 townhouses at the rear
2. Clear the site for townhouse development (2-4 townhouses)
The purpose of a residential growth zone, which this property is in, is to provide housing at increased densities. To encourage a diversity of housing types in locations offering good access to services and transport including activity centres and town centres. That's what makes this property real estate gold! Make no mistake, this property offers a solid home, a large 916m2 (approx.) allotment, excellent access to amenities and a prized Residential Growth Zone (Schedule 2)
Call now for further information!

Description:
EFFORTLESS COASTAL LIVING
With a magnificent street presence, this beautifully presented two storey PJ Scott built home offers an outstanding living environment and will appeal to those who demand quality, position and lifestyle. Graced with light filled spaces and tranquil surrounds, this property is located within a short walk to North Torquay shopping precinct, reserves, parks and sporting facilities.
Downstairs boasts a wide hallway with two spacious bedrooms both with built in robes that are serviced by a central main bathroom with floor to ceiling tiles, separate laundry and lounge/ rumpus room that flows out to the fully landscaped, low maintenance garden and outdoor entertaining area.
Designed with a chefs touch in mind, the deluxe kitchen upstairs includes a stone island benchtop, quality appliances, soft close cabinetry, built in wine rack and walk in pantry that will not disappoint. All of this is adjoined by the meals and family room complete with a north facing balcony which offers wonderful space to relax and entertain. Also on this level is the generous master bedroom complete with walk in robe, ensuite with floor to ceiling tiles and access to the balcony making it the perfect retreat.
Additional features include internal access to remote controlled double garage, hydronic heating, split system heating/ cooling, Tesla Powerwall, spotted gum timber flooring, neutral colours throughout, double glazed windows, great storage, 7.5 star energy rating and low maintenance living at its best!
* WINNER 2019 HIA Western Victoria Display Home over $500,001.

Description:
EFFORTLESS LOW MAINTENANCE FAMILY LIVING!!
Withing walking distance to primary schools this property presents the perfect home for the young family, downsizer, or investors alike, offering effortless and low maintenance living this residence will be on the top of everyone's wish list!!
Comprising 4 bedrooms with built in robes, generously sized the master bedroom with walk in robe, new vanity and ceiling fan is positioned at the front of the home while the remaining bedrooms are situated to the rear. The fabulous, chef friendly kitchen has a massive stone island bench, 900mm cooktop / oven and walk in pantry, adjoining the kitchen is the dining and living area which opens out to a north faced decked undercover alfresco / entertaining area through bi-fold doors. Adding to this is a second centrally located living room, family bathroom and good-sized separate laundry.
The home has many features including ducted gas heating, reverse cycle air conditioning, double glazed windows, solar hot water, outdoor shower, water tank, built in BBQ and Pizza Oven with a double lock up garage providing internal access. Situated on a 553m2 (approx.) allotment with low maintenance easy care gardens plus side access for the trailer, caravan, or boat. Do not miss this fantastic opportunity to secure a family home or investment property in a brilliant location and within walking distance to amenities and moments away from beaches, call us today to book your inspection!!

Description:
A Place To Call Home!
If you're searching for a quality family home, then look no further! Featuring immaculate interiors, a spacious outdoor entertaining zone and a north-facing backyard, this home ticks every box for a superb lifestyle!
When it comes to family-friendly locations, this one has it all. The morning school run will be a breeze thanks to Nazareth Catholic P.S, Mandama P.S. and Grovedale College all within easy walking distance. The expansive Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre is also a short stroll away, along with public transport and a variety of sporting grounds. To top it all off, you'll enjoy easy access to the Ring Road, Waurn Ponds Train Station, Deakin University (Waurn Ponds Campus) and Epworth Hospital.
Floorboards and new carpet enrich the interiors, which create a warm and welcoming ambience from the moment you step inside. Graced with an open fireplace, the formal lounge and dining room provide a generous setting overlooking the front garden. You'll love that this formal area can be sectioned off from the rest of the home for privacy. The open plan living/dining/kitchen zone unites with the spacious outdoor entertaining area via glass double doors. Complete with café blinds, this sheltered area makes entertaining a delight in every season. The red glass splashback adds a pop of colour to the all-white kitchen, which features a built-in pantry, ASKO dishwasher and Blanco stainless steel appliances (900mm oven, 800mm gas cooktop, 900mm rangehood).
Zoned to the rear of the home, the generous Master Bedroom will impress with a large dressing room/study and updated en suite with in-situ shower. Two additional bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to the main bathroom and separate toilet. The laundry features external access. Ducted heating and a split-system air conditioner provide additional comfort. The secure backyard wraps around the entire home, creating plenty of space for outdoor family fun. The built-in basketball hoop will be an instant hit with young ones, while the garden shed offers ample storage. The gated driveway and double carport provide off-street parking
Treat your family to the lifestyle you've been dreaming of! Enquire today!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Unbeatable Value in Prime Location
*AVAILABLE FOR INSPECTION SATURDAY 26TH SEPTEMBER - CALL TO BOOK TIME*
This solidly built home on approx. 671m2 won't last long as it offers genuinely comfortable accommodation in a well-resourced area, ideal for first-home buyers to live a convenient lifestyle close to life's essential amenities, or the savvy investor wanting to capitalise on this thriving suburb.
A short 13-minute drive in either direction will find you in the heart of Geelong CBD or at the cruisy Torquay beach scene, whilst the Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Deakin University, Epworth Hospital, quality schooling options, Leisurelink Aquatic & Recreation Centre and public transport are all easily accessible.
The home itself comprises;
3 good-sized bedrooms, two with robes
Light-filled living room with ceiling fan
Open kitchen/dining area with
Polished timber boards throughout
Gas-ducted heating plus split system a/c
Central family bathroom with 2 separate toilets
Enormous rear yard with garden shed
Subdivision potential (STCA)
The home does offer scope to customize it to your exact specifications, otherwise it is ready to live in as is, however it must be inspected to fully appreciate all that it has to offer.
At Wilsons we are conscious of playing our part in reducing the spread of COVID-19. We will therefore be conducting our property inspections using best practice sanitary measures to ensure everyone's safety. We can also arrange a virtual tour of the home if that better suits. Contact us today.

Description:
Country Living in the Heart of Leopold
This exciting property delivers a relaxed rural atmosphere with the privilege of space, plus the convenience of urban living. Set on the fringe of dynamic Leopold within 15 minutes of the Bellarine beaches and Geelong CBD. This spacious and expansive 6 bedroom plus study home occupies approx. 3186 sqm with all of life amenities just around the corner.
Boasting farmhouse charm and touches of modern inspiration, the clever design offers generously proportioned rooms, including three separate living zones and a beautiful north-facing back deck. Warm timber paneling runs throughout and matches feature leadlight windows. A charming veranda runs the length of the façade and sets the mood of relaxation that is to come.
The huge family-friendly kitchen and living hub is the heart of the home. The kitchen features a step-in pantry, gas appliances and a dishwasher. The charming lounge, with bay window, buds off the living area, and a modern extension flows to the rear, providing seamless access to a huge family room. Soaring vaulting ceilings and wide banks of glazed windows are highlights in the family room. The family room extends through glass sliding doors to the deck creating a lovely indoor-outdoor flow. A Rinnai gas heater, split system and ceiling fans control the climate in the living zones.
The bedrooms are grouped in 2 separate wings, each wing has skylights which deliver bright natural light and a family bathroom. At the rear you will find 3 double bedrooms with built-in robes. Towards the front of the home, the master bedroom (with walk-in robe and ensuite) plus a further 2 bedrooms and the study. The laundry is family-sized with backyard access and there is great storage throughout.
The grounds offer an abundant of space and adjoining farmland at the rear boosts the private, rural feel. The deck flows to a patio and large lawn with cubby house. There are productive fruit trees, a garden shed and plenty of space for further self-sufficiency.
The attached carport houses at least 2 cars, with another 2 secure in the detached double garage. The 8x4m shed makes a perfect 'man cave' or workshop.
This property oozes potential! Seize this rare opportunity for sought-after urban-rural fusion!
Insights: 21-23 Barrabool Crescent, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2016.

Description:
Old Torquay Opportunity
If you have been waiting for that once in a generation opportunity to secure a family home on a large block in old Torquay, within walking distance to everything Torquay has to offer well now you have found it!
Be surprised by the vast amount of indoor and outdoor space and general ease of living with this stellar family classic home. The home is sure to score highly with families looking for plenty of space that can be enjoyed immediately, while having the potential to add some modern inspiration of their own at a later date set on a large allotment of 1216sqm (app).
Theres lots to like about this immaculately presented home, with its choice of living areas, and a great well-appointed timber kitchen with a generous meals area that caters for any occasion. There are three large bedrooms, master with ensuite and walk in robe. Complete the picture two gas logs fireplaces, north facing deck for outdoor entertaining, lock up 2 car garage while the outdoor area and back yard allow for summertime barbeques and safe child play.
This home is ideal for those families wanting more space, or those that are looking to explore all the options available to a property of this size and location, these could include:
Renovate
Tennant the property
Live in the house while you set plans to build a new family home
Demolish and rebuild
Subdivide the land (STCA)
Develop and build townhouses (STCA)

Description:
Neat as a pin, sought after shedding.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Cam Foster on 0406 597 050.
If you are a young first home buyer in desperate need for a shed and north facing yard with entertaining area, we have the one for you.
Showcasing an impressive 10x6m gable roof garage, with backyard and carport roller door access, this property provides the ideal start for first home buyers seeking a key Belmont location or a key opportunity for the savvy investor seeking big gains in a well proven growth area. Refreshed throughout, this delightful residence aims to please with the benefit of all key amenities within close proximity. Consisting of four generous bedrooms with built in robes, master with extensive built in robes and ensuite. Light filled lounge, updated kitchen and meals area, plus central bathroom servicing the entire property.
Features include gas ducted heating and refrigerated cooling throughout, private north facing yard with undercover entertaining area and lock up 10x6m garage. Well located within easy distance of High Street Shopping, Torquay Road commercial hub, Oberon Primary School, South Barwon Reserve, Barwon River walking tracks and only a short hop to the Surf Coast, Geelong CBD and the Ring Road taking you to Melbourne in an hour. With loads on offer, be sure not miss this rare opportunity.

Address: 256 Scenic Road, Queens Park Highton VIC 3216
Description:
Classic 70s Family home on massive corner block
Driving past, you would never realise that behind the mature trees in the front yard that there is a huge home with 5 bedrooms and 5 seperate living zones including a unique north facing atrium affording expansive uninterupted views towards the North/West. If 70s architectural flare, solid construction and a huge block in a blue chip location are on your wish list then this could be the perfect fit. It is in original well loved condition and is the first time on the market for sale since construction.
Walking through is a voyage of discovery and some of the many features include:
-amazing double storey glass atrium with automatic sun blinds that needs to be seen to be believed
-split level family room with timber lining and double exposed brick
-original timber kitchen with copper range hood and St George oven
-seperate pool/games room approx 8x4m
-internal brick walls, gas heating and alarm system
-upstairs sitting area bathed in sun with amazing views
-large 20 yr old double garage/workshop plus single carport
-orchard and veggie patch in the massive back yard with apricot, fig, orange, lemon and apple trees
-established trees giving extreme privacy from Scenic Rd
This amazing family home has been lovingly cared for and gives the lucky purchaser a multitude of options, either to use as it is, renovate, or subdivide a portion off the back (STCA). Location is excellent with close proximity to Queens Park, quality schools and shops. It is an entertainers dream so if youd like to be the envy of your friends, phone now to book an inspection.
Insights: 29 other 5 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.
